resources.string:
Recent changes

Version 0.9.15
• Updated dependencies to fix incompatibilities

Version 0.9.14
• German translation
• Improved UI strings and privacy policy
• Added missing email body for \"Report a bug\"

Version 0.9.13
• Compatibility with Microsoft AAD
• Compliance with CTAP 2.1

Version 0.9.12
• Bugfixes related to attestation
• Fixed a crash when user verification times out over NFC
• Fixed display of creation dates of stored credentials

Version 0.9.11
• Bugfix for watches on Android P+

Version 0.9.10
• Manage your single-factor credentials on the watch

Version 0.9.9
• Improved interoperability with Windows 10
• Added RP ID to resident key metadata

Version 0.9.8
• Improved the UI for resets and errors

Version 0.9.7
• UI improvements in the phone app

Version 0.9.6
• Fixed a missing toast after a single CTAP2 assertion via NFC

Version 0.9.5
• Added support for transaction confirmation via the "txAuthSimple" extension

Version 0.9.4
• Added support for offline login via the "hmac-secret" extension
• Fixed a crash when extensions were requested with an assertion
Shortcut is now available on your %1$s!
Support the development of WearAuthn and unlock a watch face shortcut that directly connects WearAuthn to a preset device.
Open the Play Store on your watch and install WearAuthn from the \'Apps on your phone\' section. If you cannot find it there, just search for \'wearauthn\'.

Thank you for reporting a bug! Please provide as much information as possible below to help fix it.

What went wrong?


Steps taken before experiencing the bug:

1.
2.
3.
4.

What is the model of your watch?
(find under Settings -> System -> About)

%1$s

Which system version runs on your watch?
(find under Settings -> System -> About -> Version)


Which version of WearAuthn are you using?
(shown at the top of WearAuthn's About screen)
Go to \'Apps on your phone\' in the Play Store on your watch
Choose \'WearAuthn\' from the list and install it
